output: powerpoint_presentation

```{r include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, fig.width = 10, fig.height=5)
```


```{r  message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
source("../setup.R")
```


```{r message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
x <- read_phyto_data() |>
  mutate(year = as.numeric(year), 
         doy = as.numeric(format(date, format = "%j")))
```

```{r warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
y <- read_toxin_data() |>
  mutate(year = as.numeric(year), 
         doy = as.numeric(format(`Sampling Date`, format = "%j")),
         pst_class = as.character(recode_classification(`PSP Value`, lut=c(0,0.001,80))))
```


```{r}
pst_spec = c("Alexandrium sp.", "Alexandrium tamarense", "Alexandrium catenella", "Alexandrium minutum")
```


### Aquapark 1 (PA WB1) for oysters

***

```{r}
plot_phyto_heatmap_facet(x, station = "101", species = pst_spec)
```

***

```{r}
plot_pst_heatmap(y, "wb1")
```

***
